Subjects: prayers, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, prayers to
_description: A prayer to the Virgin Mary — three 8-line stanzas

OxfCCC59.First Lines:
Moder milde flur of alleþu ert leuedi swuþe
                    treowe…
OxfCCC59.Last Lines:
…swete leuedi sschild þu meþat min soule ne cume
                    þer in
OxfCCC59.Note:
MS incorrectly identified by Morris as Corpus Christi College 54 instead
                    of 59.
